article_title: Obama's Pop Culture Embrace Aims At Policy, But Risks A Cult Of Personality

article_metadata.description: There are times when there is no correlation between one’s popularity or ‘interestingness’ and their ability to persuade people to do what they'd like. President Obama's embrace of pop culture to sell the Affordable Care Act may be one of them
article_metadata.author: Cedric Muhammad
